channel.title: Console not opening
channel.description: I can't open the console!. I have checked the "enable developer console" box but the problem is that the tilde command has no effect with my swedish keyboard. I have tried to rebind the "toggleconsole" command in the config.cfg (I usually bind it to F11) but it changes back when I start the game. In HL2 and BM mod version, it was possible to set this in the options menu.

item.title: Console not opening
item.dc:creator: RabidMonkey
item.description:
Closing this because the problem has been solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Console not opening
item.dc:creator: LarsBR
item.description:
Thank you! It worked!

Read full topic

item.title: Console not opening
item.dc:creator: dogelition_man
item.description:
Workaround:
Launch the game with the -console launch option and in the console, do “bind [key] toggleconsole”

Read full topic

item.title: Console not opening
item.dc:creator: LarsBR
item.description:
I can’t open the console!. I have checked the “enable developer console” box but the problem is that the tilde command has no effect with my swedish keyboard. I have tried to rebind the “toggleconsole” command in the config.cfg (I usually bind it to F11) but it changes back when I start the game.
In HL2 and BM mod version, it was possible to set this in the options menu.

Read full topic
